palette.title: Hyperlink (Anchor)
palette.tooltip: A clickable hyperlink to an internal or external target

palette.title: Abbreviation
palette.tooltip: An explanation for an abbreviation

palette.title: Address
palette.tooltip: A part of text being marked up as an address or other contact information

palette.title: Article
palette.tooltip: An article consisting of multiple sections, headers, paragraphs, etc.

Header

First section

This is the first paragraph.

palette.title: Aside
palette.tooltip: An area containing tangential content.

palette.title: Audio Stream
palette.tooltip: An audio stream

palette.title: Bold Text
palette.tooltip: A part of text, typically offset in bold

palette.title: Bi-directional Text (isolated)
palette.tooltip: A part of text, isolated from its surroundings for the purposes of bidirectional text formatting

palette.title: Bi-directional Text
palette.tooltip: A part of bi-directional text, that has a direction, overriding the surrounding direction

palette.title: Blockquote
palette.tooltip: A block of quoted text

palette.title: Submit Button
palette.tooltip: A button to submit a form

palette.title: Reset Button
palette.tooltip: A button to reset the form

palette.title: Generic Button
palette.tooltip: A button without any special functionality

properties.expert: form formaction formenctype formmethod formtarget formnovalidate

palette.title: Canvas
palette.tooltip: An area for dynamic graphics

palette.title: Caption
palette.tooltip: The title for a table

palette.title: Cited Work
palette.tooltip: The cited title of a work

palette.title: Code Fragment
palette.tooltip: A fragment of code, typically styled in monospaced font

palette.title: Column
palette.tooltip: A column of a table

palette.title: Column Group
palette.tooltip: A group of table columns

palette.title: Generic Command
palette.tooltip: A command with an associated action

palette.title: Radio Command
palette.tooltip: A selection of one item from a list of items

palette.title: Checkbox Command
palette.tooltip: A state or option that can be toggled

palette.title: Datalist
palette.tooltip: A set of option elements that represent predefined options for other controls

palette.title: Description
palette.tooltip: The description part of a term-description pair

palette.title: Deleted Text
palette.tooltip: A part of text, marked up as deleted (i.e. typically striked through)

palette.title: Details
palette.tooltip: A hideable area containing detail information

palette.title: Defining Instance
palette.tooltip: Represents the defining instance of a term

palette.title: Dialog Box
palette.tooltip: A dialog box or window

palette.title: Container
palette.tooltip: A generic container for flow content that by itself does not represent anything

palette.title: Description List
palette.tooltip: A list of term-description pairs

palette.title: Term
palette.tooltip: The term or name part of a term-description pair

palette.title: Emphasis
palette.tooltip: A span of text with emphatic stress, typically styled italic

palette.title: Embedded Content
palette.tooltip: An integration point for external content

palette.title: Fieldset
palette.tooltip: A set of form controls grouped under a common name

palette.title: Figure Caption
palette.tooltip: A caption or legend for a figure

palette.title: Figure
palette.tooltip: A unit of content, optionally with a caption, that is self-contained, that is typically referenced as a single unit from the main flow of the document

palette.title: Footer
palette.tooltip: The footer for the section it applies to

palette.title: Form
palette.tooltip: The footer for the section it applies to

meta.creation: <form name="form" action="" method="get"> <fieldset name="fieldset"> <input type="text" name="text-input" value=""/> <button type="submit">Submit</button> </fieldset> </form>

palette.tooltip: Displays a level 1 header

palette.tooltip: Displays a level 2 header

palette.tooltip: Displays a level 3 header

palette.tooltip: Displays a level 4 header

palette.tooltip: Displays a level 5 header

palette.tooltip: Displays a level 6 header

palette.title: Header
palette.tooltip: The header of a section

palette.title: Headings Group
palette.tooltip: A group of headings

palette.title: Thematic Break
palette.tooltip: A paragraph-level thematic break, genuinely a horizontal rule

palette.title: Italic Text
palette.tooltip: A span of text offset from its surrounding content without conveying any extra emphasis or importance, and for which the conventional typographic presentation is italic text

palette.title: Nested Content
palette.tooltip: A new nested browsing context

palette.title: Image
palette.tooltip: An image from a local or a remote location

palette.title: Text Input Field
palette.tooltip: A one-line plain text edit control

palette.tooltip: A state or option that can be toggled

properties.normal: disabled form maxlength readonly size autocomplete autofocus required placeholder

palette.title: Radio Button
palette.tooltip: A selection of one item from a list of items

palette.title: Generic Button
palette.tooltip: A button with no additional semantics

palette.title: Submit Button
palette.tooltip: A button for submitting a form

palette.title: Reset Button
palette.tooltip: A button for resetting a form

palette.title: File Selection Field
palette.tooltip: An input control to select one or multiple files (e.g. for uploading purposes)

properties.normal: disabled form autofocus accept required multiple

palette.title: Hidden Field
palette.tooltip: A hidden field that is not intended to be examined or manipulated by the user

palette.title: Image(-coordinates) Input Control
palette.tooltip: An image from which the UA enables a user to interactively select a pair of coordinates and submit the form, or alternatively a button from which the user can submit the form

palette.title: Date/Time Input Control
palette.tooltip: A control for setting the element’s value to a string representing a global date and time (with timezone information)

properties.normal: disabled form autofocus autocomplete min max step readonly required

palette.title: Date/Time Input Control
palette.tooltip: A control for setting the element’s value to a string representing a global date and time (without timezone information)

properties.normal: disabled form autofocus autocomplete min max step readonly required

palette.tooltip: A control for setting the element’s value to a string representing a global date and time (without timezone information)

properties.normal: disabled form autofocus autocomplete min max step readonly required

palette.title: Date Input Control
palette.tooltip: A control for setting the element’s value to a string representing a date

properties.normal: disabled form autofocus autocomplete min max step readonly required

palette.title: Month Input Control
palette.tooltip: A control for setting the element’s value to a string representing a month

properties.normal: disabled form autofocus autocomplete min max step readonly required

palette.title: Time Input Control
palette.tooltip: A control for setting the element’s value to a string representing a time (with no timezone information)

properties.normal: disabled form autofocus autocomplete min max step readonly required

palette.tooltip: A control for setting the element’s value to a string representing a week

properties.normal: disabled form autofocus autocomplete min max step readonly required placeholder

palette.title: Number-range Input Control
palette.tooltip: An imprecise control for setting the element’s value to a string representing a number

properties.normal: disabled form autofocus autocomplete min max step readonly required

palette.title: Email Input Control
palette.tooltip: A control for editing a list of e-mail addresses given in the element’s value

properties.normal: disabled form autofocus autocomplete maxlength step readonly required placeholder size multiple

meta.creation: <input type="email" value="" name="email" placeholder="Enter email address..."/>

palette.title: URL Input Control
palette.tooltip: A control for editing an absolute URL given in the element’s value

properties.normal: disabled form autofocus autocomplete maxlength step readonly required placeholder size

palette.title: Search Input Control
palette.tooltip: A one-line plain-text edit control for entering one or more search terms

properties.normal: disabled form autofocus autocomplete maxlength step readonly required placeholder size

meta.creation: <input type="search" value="" name="search" placeholder="Enter search terms..."/>

palette.title: Phone Number Input Control
palette.tooltip: A one-line plain-text edit control for entering a telephone number

properties.normal: disabled form autofocus autocomplete maxlength step readonly required placeholder size

meta.creation: <input type="tel" value="" name="phone" placeholder="Enter phone number..."/>

palette.title: Color Selection Control
palette.tooltip: A color-well control, for setting the element’s value to a string representing a simple color

palette.title: Inserted Text
palette.tooltip: A range of text that has been inserted (added) to a document

palette.title: Keyboard Typed Text
palette.tooltip: A range of text that is marked up as a example for typed text, typically set in monospaced font

palette.title: Key-pair Generator Control
palette.tooltip: A control for generating a public-private key pair and for submitting the public key from that key pair

palette.title: Label
palette.tooltip: A caption for a form control

palette.title: Legend
palette.tooltip: A title or explanatory caption for the rest of the contents of the legend element’s parent element

palette.title: List Item
palette.tooltip: A list item of either an ordered or an unordered list

palette.title: List Item
palette.tooltip: A list item of either an ordered or an unordered list or a menu

palette.title: Main Content
palette.tooltip: The main content

palette.title: Image Map (map part)
palette.tooltip: In conjunction with any area element descendants, defines an image map

palette.title: Marked (highlighted) Text
palette.tooltip: A run of text in one document marked or highlighted for reference purposes

palette.title: Menu
palette.tooltip: A list of menu items

palette.title: Context Menu Item
palette.tooltip: An item of a custom context menu

properties.normal: checked default disabled icon label radiogroup type

palette.title: Scalar Gauge
palette.tooltip: A scalar gauge providing a measurement within a known range, or a fractional value

properties.normal: value min max low high optimum

meta.creation: <meter min="0" max="100" optimum="50" value="50" low="25" hight="75"></meter>

palette.title: Navigation
palette.tooltip: A section of a document that links to other documents or to parts within the document itself; that is, a section of navigation links

palette.title: Fallback Content for Scripts
palette.tooltip: A part of text to be presented whenever the surrounding scripted control is not supported by the user's browsing/rendering engine

meta.creation: <noscript>This text is displayed, when the script is not supported</noscript>

palette.title: Object (generic external content)
palette.tooltip: Generic external content, such as a Flash Container or alike

palette.title: Ordered List
palette.tooltip: A list (or sequence) of items; that is, a list in which the items are intentionally ordered, such that changing the order would change the meaning of the list

meta.creation:
1. First List Item
  2. Second List Item
  3. Third List Item

palette.title: Option Group
palette.tooltip: A group of option elements with a common label

palette.title: Option Item
palette.tooltip: An option in a select control, or an option in a labelled set of options grouped together in an Option Group, or an option among the list of suggestions in a Data List

palette.title: Output/Result
palette.tooltip: The result of a calculation (e.g. in a Form)

palette.title: Paragraph
palette.tooltip: A paragraph of text

palette.title: Object Parameter
palette.tooltip: Defines parameters for plugins invoked by object elements

palette.title: Preformatted Text
palette.tooltip: A block of preformatted text, in which structure is represented by typographic conventions rather than by elements

palette.title: Progress Indicator
palette.tooltip: Represents the completion progress of a task

palette.title: Quoted Text
palette.tooltip: Content quoted from another source

palette.title: Ruby Parenthesis
palette.tooltip: Can be used to provide parentheses around a ruby text component of a ruby annotation, to be shown by UAs that don’t support ruby annotations

palette.title: Ruby Text
palette.tooltip: Marks the ruby text component of a ruby annotation

palette.title: Ruby Text
palette.tooltip: Allows spans of phrasing content to be marked with ruby annotations

palette.title: Struck Text
palette.tooltip: Contents that are no longer accurate or no longer relevant and that therefore has been “struck” from the document (typically styled striked through)

palette.title: Sample Output
palette.tooltip: Represents (sample) output from a program or computing system

palette.title: Section
palette.tooltip: Section of a document, typically with a title or heading

palette.title: Selection Form Control
palette.tooltip: A control for selecting among a list of options

properties.normal: disabled form size multiple autofocus required

palette.title: Small Print Text
palette.tooltip: So-called “fine print” or “small print”, such as legal disclaimers and caveats

palette.title: Media Source
palette.tooltip: Enables multiple media sources to be specified for audio and video elements

palette.title: Span of Text
palette.tooltip: A generic wrapper for phrasing content that by itself does not represent anything

palette.title: Strongly Emphasized Text
palette.tooltip: A span of text with strong importance (typically set bold)

palette.title: Subscript
palette.tooltip: A span of text set in subscript

palette.title: Summary
palette.tooltip: A summary, caption, or legend for a Details element

palette.title: Super Script
palette.tooltip: A span of text set in superscript

palette.title: Table
palette.tooltip: A table; that is, data with more than one dimension

meta.creation:
1st Column Head 2nd Column Head
1st Column Data 2nd Column Data

palette.title: Table Row Group
palette.tooltip: A block of rows that consist of a body of data for its parent Table

meta.creation: 1st Row, 1st Column Data 1st Row, 2nd Column Data 2nd Row, 1st Column Data 2nd Row, 2nd Column Data

palette.title: Table Cell
palette.tooltip: A data cell in a table

palette.title: Multiline Text Input Field
palette.tooltip: A multi-line plain-text edit control for the element’s raw value

properties.normal: text disabled form readonly maxlength autofocus required placeholder rows cols

palette.title: Table Footer
palette.tooltip: The block of rows that consist of the column summaries (footers) for its parent table element

palette.title: Table Header Cell
palette.tooltip: A header cell in a table

palette.title: Table Header
palette.tooltip: The block of rows that consist of the column labels (headings) for its parent Table

palette.title: Time
palette.tooltip: A date and/or time

palette.title: Table Row
palette.tooltip: A row of cells in a table

meta.creation: 1st Cell of a Table Row 2nd Cell of a Table Row

palette.title: Supplementary Media Track
palette.tooltip: Enables supplementary media tracks such as subtitle tracks and caption tracks to be specified for audio and video elements

meta.creation: <track kind="subtitles" src="" label="Default Subtitles (EN)" srclang="en" default="default"/>

palette.title: Underlined Text
palette.tooltip: A span of text offset from its surrounding content without conveying any extra emphasis or importance, and for which the conventional typographic presentation is underlining

palette.title: Unordered List
palette.tooltip: An unordered list of items; that is, a list in which changing the order of the items would not change the meaning of list.

palette.title: Variable/Placeholder
palette.tooltip: Either a variable in a mathematical expression or programming context, or placeholder text that the reader is meant to mentally replace with some other literal value

palette.title: Video
palette.tooltip: A video or movie

properties.normal: autoplay preload controls loop poster height width muted
